name: community
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the people living in one particular area or people who are considered as a unit because of their common interests, social group, or nationality

example.eg: He's well known in the local community.
There's a large black/white/Jewish community living in this area.
example.egtrans: 在该地区有一个大的黑人／白人／犹太人社区。

example.eg: Her speech caused outrage among the gay community.
example.egtrans: 她的演说激起了同性恋群体的愤怒。

example.eg: Drug trafficking is a matter of considerable concern for the entire international community (= all the countries of the world).
example.egtrans: 毒品走私是整个国际社会都相当关注的问题。

example.eg: There's a real sense of community (= caring and friendly feeling) in this neighbourhood.
example.egtrans: 在该地区有一种真正的社区归属感。

trans_examp.trans_en: a group of animals or plants that live or grow together

example.eg: Unlike the present government, we believe in serving the community.
example.egtrans: 与现任政府不同，我们信奉服务大众。
